title: 146,000 could live
brief_description: Dramatically presents each of the seven danger signals for cancer. Five are represented by people cured of cancer, one by a woman who lost her son to cancer and one by a man who notices a danger signal but found, when he went to a doctor, that he did not have cancer. Originally presented on television. Narrated by Charles S. Cameron.
